checkbox1.label: Agree to register this device under my AcerID (one will be created if the email address is not registered yet)

checkbox2.label: Agree to receive offers and updates from Acer

checkbox3.label: Allow Acer to share my contact details with Norton to receive updates about the pre-installed security software of this device

customerinfo.label: Allow Acer to provide enhanced support and improve device usage experience through User Experience Improvement Program, and accept its terms of use
